mobiles.name: The Elite Guard
mobiles.long_description: The Royal Guard of Krytos stands here, defending their Lord and Master against all intruders.
mobiles.description:
This is the most elite of all of the Royal Guards in the tower. 
Incredibly tough and skilled, you'd be a fool for even thinking about attacking them.

mobiles.name: The Royal Guard
mobiles.long_description: The Royal Guard of Krytos stands here, contemplating your death.
mobiles.description:
This is one of Krytos' reknown guards of death. Luckily for you, 
he isn't aggressive by nature...unless you foolishly decide to attack him.

mobiles.name: A servant
mobiles.long_description: A servant of the tower stands here, wondering what he is to do next.
mobiles.description:
This poor man works here slaving around serving whoever happens to catch him. 
He looks at you pitifully.

mobiles.name: A serving wench
mobiles.long_description: The serving wench stands here, ready to serve.
mobiles.description:
Her clothes are dirty and unwashed, and she rushes around trying to 
fulfill the requests for food (and other things). She looks at you anxiously, 
awaiting orders for food and drink.

mobiles.name: A tower chef
mobiles.long_description: The chef runs about cooking and serving.
mobiles.description:
The chef stands tall and proud, even though he's short and fat. 
He prepares the finest of foods for the Lord Krytos. 
As you look towards him, he invites you to take a seat.

mobiles.name: A proud Lady
mobiles.short_description: A proud Lady of the Tower
mobiles.long_description: A proud Lady of the tower stands here with her nose turned up.
mobiles.description:
The snobby woman is well dressed and cared for, and ignores 
your presence. Even though she is a woman, be warned, 
she is no push-over.

mobiles.name: Lord Krytos
mobiles.long_description: Lord Krytos sees you and attacks!
mobiles.description:
This is Lord Krytos himself. He is dressed in jewelry and 
armor from head t toe. So this is where all the wealth is. 
You have intruded upon his private space, 
and are about to pay dearly for that mistake.

mobiles.name: The Royal Lady
mobiles.long_description: The Royal Lady lies in bed here, wondering what you're doing in this room.
mobiles.description:
The Royal Lady is stunningly beautiful, but underneath that beauty and fragility, 
she is a powerful fighter. Best watch out before you try anything.

mobiles.name: A boy in training
mobiles.long_description: A lithe young man runs about dodging and parrying attacks.
mobiles.description:
You see a muscular yet lean young man practicing his weapon skills against another. 
He seems not the least bit distracted by your arrival.

mobiles.name: A weaponsmaster
mobiles.long_description: The weaponsmaster stands here disregarding you.
mobiles.description:
He is a powerfully built man, with broad shoulders and strong arms. 
Not someone that you would want to mess with.

mobiles.name: A young girl
mobiles.long_description: The young girl sits on the bed, crying.

mobiles.name: The Guardian
mobiles.long_description: A giant dragon springs forward and attacks you!
mobiles.description:
The giant dragon is covered in shimmering rainbow scales. 
Even in the dark, you can see his claws and fangs as you run for your life.

mobiles.name: The blacksmith
mobiles.long_description: The blacksmith of the tower stands here ready to serve you.
mobiles.description:
The blacksmith is covered with black stains of heated carbon, 
and a thick film of sweat. 
You notice a large hammer gripped firmly in his strong hands.

mobiles.name: A savage beast
mobiles.long_description: A savage beast rushes you as you enter.
mobiles.description:
It is insanely thin and unkept for, and even as it rushes 
towards you to rip you apart, you feel a bit of symphathy for it.

mobiles.name: A starving prisoner
mobiles.long_description: A bony prisoner reaches out for you.
mobiles.description:
You gaze upon his frail body, wondering how long ago his last meal was. 
The poor man seems about to perish anytime now, yet he hangs on for life. 
Maybe you should end his misery here and now.

mobiles.name: The Gryphon
mobiles.long_description: The Gryphon stands here, ready to hunt and kill.
mobiles.description:
A huge bird stands here proudly with wings spread. As you look closer, 
you realize this isn't a regular bird, but a powerful gryphon.

mobiles.name: A huge rat
mobiles.long_description: A huge rat crawls around here.
mobiles.description:
The huge rat is disgusting to look at, and you wish the room was 
completely dark to save you the site of this beast. 
Nosferatu beware, you have a rival in appearances.

mobiles.name: The Giant Slug
mobiles.long_description: The Giant Slug swallows you whole!
mobiles.description: You see a mass of oozing flesh sliding towards you. Quick, get the salt!

mobiles.name: The Headless Mob
mobiles.long_description: A headless monster faces you and attacks!
mobiles.description:
You see no head! What proud warrior could have this poor man been? 
Well, no time to think about it now. He's about to rip you to shreds.

mobiles.name: A little chicken
mobiles.long_description: A chicken stands here, completely clueless.
mobiles.description: You see a little chicken with lots of feathers, and a little beak.

objects.name: Sword of the Royal Guard
objects.description: A glinting platinum sword lies here.

objects.name: The Hammer of the Elite
objects.description: A giant black hammer lies on the ground.

objects.name: a tattered shirt
objects.description: A tattered shirt lies here on the ground un-used.

objects.name: a worn dress
objects.description: A worn dress lies crumpled on the ground.

objects.name: A Full Body Plate
objects.description: A large piece of armor lies on the ground unattended.

objects.name: A Pair of Royal Leggings
objects.description: A pair of shiny leggings rests here.

objects.name: Sleeves of the Guards
objects.description: Some golden sleeves lie here waiting to be worn.

objects.name: A cup of wine
objects.description: A cup of wine waiting to be drunk from.

objects.name: A beautiful dress
objects.description: A soft, silky dress was dropped here.

objects.name: A ring of royalty
objects.description: A shiny golden ring lies on the floor.

objects.name: A plate of chicken
objects.description: A plate of chicken is waiting to be eaten.

objects.name: The Sword of Reknown
objects.description: A strange sword lies here radiating much energy.

objects.name: A practice sword
objects.description: A small sword rests here.

objects.name: A practice hammer
objects.description: A hammer used for practice rests here.

objects.name: The Weaponmaster's Sword
objects.description: A really long sword rests on the training grounds.

objects.name: A huge hammer
objects.description: A dangerously large hammer sits on the floor.

objects.name: A skimpy skirt
objects.description: A short, skimpy skirt lies here.

objects.name: A gigantic claw
objects.description: A gigantic claw rests here.

objects.name: Fangs of Doom
objects.description: A pair of long fangs rests here.

objects.name: Scales of Invincibility
objects.description: A large suit of armor lies here untaken.

objects.name: Cape of Royalty
objects.description: A long flowing cape rests here.

objects.name: A Mystic Hammer
objects.description: A shimmering black hammer lies here unused.

objects.name: Beaks of Death
objects.description: A long beak rests here.

objects.name: The Phantom Blade
objects.description: A dark evil sword lies here.

objects.name: A vanishing cloak
objects.description: A fading black cloak rests here.

rooms.name: Entrance to the Tower of Krytos
rooms.description:
This is one of the smallest chambers anyone has ever seen. 
Small and circular, it looks like the room could barely fit 
even 4 people at the most. 
So much for a lord of the land being wealthy.

rooms.name: The Common Room
rooms.description:
You stand in the middle of a suddenly much larger room, 
probably the base of the tower. It is eerily quiet in 
here and your hair stands on end. Continue on up if 
you're starting to feel queasy.

rooms.name: The Stairway up the Base
rooms.description: The stairs wind up and up, seemingly never ending. Where will they stop?

rooms.name: Eastern Wing of the Base
rooms.description:
There is really not much in here except for piles of 
dust and some random objects lying around, probably 
not yours. You had best go back to where you came from.

rooms.name: Western Wing of the Base
rooms.description:
The room is completely empty! You'd think high lords 
would have more to hoard, but apparently he has come 
upon hard times. Hopefully he'll get rich quick 
(and allow you to loot something soon)

rooms.name: North of the Base
rooms.description:
This appears to be the main congregation hall for the 
royal guards of the high lord. There are many seated 
at the tables, and they eye you warily.

rooms.name: Beginning of the Tower
rooms.description:
This is the formal entrance up the tower. Due to the 
stones used in contruction, you can hear the deafening 
chatter of almost everyone in the tower, driving you 
insane. To the south you can a window, and to the 
north you can hear clanging sounds.

rooms.name: South of the Base
rooms.description:
This is the bedroom for the most elite of the royal guards. 
Careful now...they don't take too kindly to strangers in 
their private space. Best be heading back out.

rooms.name: The Window South
rooms.description:
What a view! You can see the mountains and valleys for 
many miles out to the south. The lake out beside the 
tower seems to glow, and the tranquility of this room 
is amazingly calming. It's no wonder that many of the 
tower guards come here to meditate and contemplate life.

rooms.name: The Repair Room
rooms.description:
This is where armor and weapons are repaired. There is 
a full service blacksmith standing here, and a few bored 
guards waiting for their equipment to be fixed. 
Unfortunately, as good as he is, the blacksmith 
only services the tower's personnel.

rooms.name: The Treasury
rooms.description:
The room is curiously enough, empty. Is it because the 
lord is bankrupt, or is he just hiding the gold somewhere 
else...? The lone guard in the corner seems bored out of 
his mind, and you question the lord's decision to keep 
this empty room guarded.

rooms.name: The Equipment Room
rooms.description:
So this is where all of their armor and weapons are stored. 
Along the walls you can see plates of mail and huge swords, 
all with plaques engraved with the names of their owners.

rooms.name: The Gathering
rooms.description:
This is the main room for tower gatherings, whether for 
briefings, entertainment, or whatever else the guards 
can think of. Great aromas arise out of the room to the 
east, while in the west it stinks of garbage. Head north 
to continue one's voyage further up the tower.

rooms.name: The Dining Room
rooms.description:
You are standing in a semi-large room with 3 windows open 
to the world outside. There sits a table in the very center 
of the room, with quite a few chairs set around it. The 
chefs rush in and out constantly to keep the guards well fed.

rooms.name: The Big Dump
rooms.description:
The smell of trash overwhelms you the instant you enter this 
room, and as you try to recover you can see huge piles of 
left-over food, human wastes, and some unidentifiable junk. 
It is amazing that anyone walk in this room at all without 
vomiting all over themselves.

rooms.name: On the way up
rooms.description:
As this large tower is built on a mountainside, the foundations 
are built in a slant, which explains why the tower seems to be 
split the way it is internally. This small room contains only a 
small ladder to assist in reaching the upper parts of the 
building, and exits to to more wings.

rooms.name: A training room
rooms.description:
You enter a large room designated for practice. Many young men are 
training and sparring against one another here, hoping to one day 
be worthy of serving Lord Krytos.

rooms.name: Another room for training
rooms.description:
This large room contains more young men honing their battle skills. 
As you enter, the weaponsmaster gazes at your warily. 
You can never be too careful.

rooms.name: More Stairs
rooms.description:
You walk in here expecting nothing but stairs, and that is exactly 
what you see. A large winding stairway goes up, with bedrooms for 
the tower workers to the east and west.

rooms.name: Bedroom for the servants
rooms.description:
Here are the bedrooms for the servants of the tower. It is 
incredibly empty except for wooden beds. You wonder how someone 
could possibly survive in here.

rooms.name: Bedroom for the wenches
rooms.description:
This is a bedroom for the serving wenches. It is completely 
empty except for some beds, and a mirror on the wall. You begin 
to question the humanity of keeping human beings in such conditions.

rooms.name: The Chamber of Meditation
rooms.description:
This is a room used by all in times of personal turmoil, or 
for general relaxation. Many guards journey here after 
practice to increase their mental prowess as well as physical.

rooms.name: An Empty Chamber
rooms.description:
There used to be some purpose for this room, but no more. 
It's just a large empty space now used for whatever purpose 
the lord of the tower can think of.

rooms.name: The Chamber of Deflowerment
rooms.description:
You see many young girls crying in this chamber, and can only 
wonder crying about what. Then you see the sadistic toys, 
some white spotches, Lord Krytos's personal clothes, 
and you get the idea.

rooms.name: The Winding Stairs
rooms.description: As you wander the stairs, with a pounding heart you realize you are now hopelessly LOST.

rooms.name: The Entrance to Lord Krytos' Bedroom
rooms.description:
You are standing in front of Lord Krytos' bedroom. 
His Elite Guards are here to stop you from going any further.

rooms.name: Lord Krytos's Bedroom
rooms.description:
You're here finally! You get to meet the great Lord Krytos himself, 
as well as become his latest victim. Good Night.

rooms.name: The Ladies' Room
rooms.description:
This is the room where the wives of Lord Krytos' guards sleep. 
You had best no disturb them, for dispite their good looks, 
aren't all that nice.

rooms.name: The Recreation Room
rooms.description:
This is Lord Krytos' personal recreation room. No one really 
knows what he does in here, and most people don't want to know, 
except for the two guards standing at the door.

rooms.name: The Forbidden Area
rooms.description:
You have entered a hidden room that is unnervingly silent, 
yet you can hear heavy breathing in the corner. 
Maybe you should find the exit and leave.

rooms.name: The Forbidden Arena
rooms.description:
This was used for the lord's personal entertainment, 
until he ran out of monsters to bring in. Still, you 
had best be on your guard, for it is not known what remains here.

rooms.name: The Forbidden Arena
rooms.description:
This was used for the lord's personal entertainment, 
until he ran out of monsters to bring in. Still, you 
had best be on your guard, for it is not known what remains here.

rooms.name: The Forbidden Arena
rooms.description:
This was used for the lord's personal entertainment, 
until he ran out of monsters to bring in. Still, you 
had best be on your guard, for it is not known what remains here.

rooms.name: The Forbidden Arena
rooms.description:
This was used for the lord's personal entertainment, 
until he ran out of monsters to bring in. Still, you 
had best be on your guard, for it is not known what remains here.

rooms.name: A secret shortcut
rooms.description:
What is this...a hidden shortcut through the tower? 
It could be...or it could be just another dead end.

rooms.name: A Dungeon
rooms.description:
This, unknown to the world, is where Lord Krytos kept 
prisoners from wars, insurrections, or just out of 
sadistic pleasure. It is extremely dirty and smelly, 
and you can barely see in here.

rooms.name: More of the Dungeon
rooms.description:
You wander through more of the dungeon, wondering how 
big it is, and how many prisoners it kept.

rooms.name: More of the Dungeon
rooms.description:
You wander through more of the dungeon, wondering 
how big it is, and how many prisoners it kept.

rooms.name: More of the Dungeon
rooms.description:
You wander through more of the dungeon, wondering 
how big it is, and how many prisoners it kept.

rooms.name: Mouth of the River
rooms.description:
You are at the northern mouth of the river. 
There is a pier here that leads to land to
the south.

rooms.name: Tower Crown
rooms.description:
WOW! What a sight! From here you are at least 800 feet 
up from the highest patch of land this tower was built on. 
The freezing air passes through your hair and past your 
head as you experience new found freedom.

rooms.name: The Underground
rooms.description:
You have entered a long hidden room deep under the tower. 
It is completely dark, and you strain to see anything at all.

rooms.name: The Hidden Tunnels
rooms.description:
You are standing in the middle of wet gooey muck that surrounds 
your feet. This tunnel is damp and smelly, probably used as a sewer.

rooms.name: Another Underground Tunnel
rooms.description:
This is more of the strange underground tunnel system. 
Hope you don't get too lost.

rooms.name: More Tunnels
rooms.description:
There's more? You can't believe your eyes as you try to 
get out of here - More gray walls block your way out. What to do?

rooms.name: A Dark Room
rooms.description: You can't see anything in here. Best try to feel your way back out.

rooms.name: A Death Trap
rooms.description:
You've stumbled upon the lair of a beast, and a not 
too friendly one at that. Prepare to die.

rooms.name: Even further out
rooms.description:
This is insane. You shouldn't be here. Go journey 
closer to the surface of the earth. Head back up.

rooms.name: The Unknown Abyss
rooms.description:
As you finally reach the bottom of the stairs, you hope 
this is the end of the journey down. You can feel your 
ears popping from the pressure.

rooms.name: The Endless Abyss
rooms.description:
The rooms extend out from the central abyss, making 
finding your way back harder than you think. 
Should have brought a map.

rooms.name: The Endless Abyss
rooms.description:
More weblike paths make getting out of here difficult. 
The lack of light sure doesn't help any.

rooms.name: The Endless Abyss
rooms.description:
Could it be you are lost? Going in circles? Or are you 
just walking into the same room over and over again?

rooms.name: The Endless Abyss
rooms.description:
Your heart beats faster as you try to find a way out. 
What to do? You are hopelessly lost, and there is no one to help you.

rooms.name: The End!
rooms.description:
Finally! You've reached the end of the abyss, and can 
start planning your way back all over again. 
The Gods laugh at your misery.

rooms.name: The Coup
rooms.description:
Look at all the little chickens! They're everywhere! 
Maybe you can steal one without anyone noticing.

rooms.name: More Chickens!
rooms.description: There are still more chickens in here! How many does this tower keep??

rooms.name: More Chickens!
rooms.description: There are still more chickens in here! How many does this tower keep??

rooms.name: More Chickens!
rooms.description: There are still more chickens in here! How many does this tower keep??
